alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Otsego; Schuyler; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 5:18PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF STEUBEN...OTSEGO...CHEMUNG... CHENANGO...CORTLAND...SCHUYLER...TIOGA...BROOME...DELAWARE...AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 30 MPH or greater which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. Expect periods of heavy snowfall as the squall passes. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 515 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Stamford to near Franklin to near Chenango Forks to near Hornby and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Ithaca, Elmira, Vestal, Johnson City, Oneonta, Endicott, Southport, Barton and Big Flats. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 9. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 51A and 57, and between 62 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 18. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Otsego; Schuyler; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins
